description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Text Services Framework elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-21417):

1. Download and apply the relevant updates for your Windows version from the official update catalog.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure that changes take effect.

**Details**:
This vulnerability can allow an attacker to gain elevated privileges on affected systems. Microsoft has released several update packages to mitigate this risk. Ensure that your system is running one of the affected Windows versions before proceeding with the updates. The updates are crucial for maintaining system security and integrity.

**Preconditions**:
- Make sure all critical data is backed up before applying any updates.
- Identify the correct build number to ensure you're using the correct update package.

Available update packages can be found at:
- [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
- [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
- [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
